text:
[Verse]
City streets are glowing
Stars in neon skies
Dancing shadows knowing
Secrets in their eyes

[Verse 2]
Whispers in the alleys
Echoes in the night
Lonely hearts on rally
Chasing distant light

[Chorus]
Midnight lights are calling
Feel the rhythm rise
In the midnight falling
We break the ties

[Verse 3]
Footsteps blend with music
Laughter fills the air
Moments feel like magic
Love is everywhere

[Bridge]
Underneath the starlight
Dreamers come alive
In this endless twilight
We truly thrive

[Chorus]
Midnight lights are calling
Feel the rhythm rise
In the midnight falling
We break the ties
title: Midnight Lights
